# NOC Config Maker - Email Configuration
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your credentials

# SMTP Server Settings
SMTP_SERVER=smtp.office365.com
SMTP_PORT=587

# Email Credentials
SMTP_USERNAME=whamza@team.nxlink.com
SMTP_PASSWORD=your-app-password-here

# Email Addresses
FEEDBACK_FROM_EMAIL=whamza@team.nxlink.com
FEEDBACK_TO_EMAIL=whamza@team.nxlink.com
FEEDBACK_CC_EMAIL=

# Optional: OpenAI API Key (if using OpenAI instead of Ollama)
# OPENAI_API_KEY=your-key-here

# Optional: JWT Secret (auto-generated if not set)
# JWT_SECRET=your-secret-here
